summary: An ordinance relating to and authorizing the issuance and sale of general negotiable interest bearing serial coupon bonds in the sum of Eight Hundred Fifty Thousand Dollars ($850,000) for corporate purposes, to-wit: the payment of certain back salary due members of the Police and Fire Departments; providing for a loan; providing for the levy and collection of taxes for the payment of principal and interest of said bonds, and creating and establishing a bond interest and redemption fund.
